mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user AS u (u.uid,u.username,u.password,u.salt,u.phone,u.email,u.identity ,u.name ,u.birthday,u.sex,u.account_type) VALUES (#{uid},#{username},#{password},#{salt},#{phone},#{email},#{identity},#{name}, #{birthday},#{sex},#{account_type})
mapper.update: UPDATE user AS u SET u.password = #{newPassword} WHERE u.username = #{username}
mapper.select: SELECT u.* from user AS u where u.username=#{username}
SELECT u.* from user AS u where username=#{username}
SELECT u.phone FROM user AS u WHERE u.phone=#{phoneNumber}
